name: Fort Defense, Fort Defense North Menace & DayD Tower Rush
name_original: Fort Defense, Fort Defense North Menace & DayD Tower Rush
description:
Fort Defense
All hands on deck! Pirate armada dead ahead! Build towers, collect crystals, upgrade spells, defend fortress against pirates.

Fort Defense North Menace
Enjoy 20 levels, which create an atmosphere of cold Arctic ice.

DayD Tower Rush
Defend yourself from a horde of vicious creatures by building towers and catapults, and defend the time machine at all costs!


Fort Defense, Fort Defense North Menace & DayD Tower Rush

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
10500 minimum space required
1 Player
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
